price: Nokorε, yεwͻ awerεhyem sε, yɛ Wura Nyankopͻn de yεn mfomsoͻ bεkyε yεn sε yεn ne nnipa a wͻn adikan agye adie “.
arabic: إِنَّا نَطۡمَعُ أَن يَغۡفِرَ لَنَا رَبُّنَا خَطَٰيَٰنَآ أَن كُنَّآ أَوَّلَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: innā naṭmaʿu an yaghfira lanā rabbunā khaṭāyānā an kunnā awwala al-mu'minīna
